articles.title: Lara Trump claims pricier turkeys are a liberal plot against Thanksgiving - The Guardian
articles.description: Ex-presidents daughter-in-law tells Fox News leftwing Americans ‘don’t want us to have any shared traditions’ and turkey prices were means that end
articles.content:
Lara Trump, the Fox News contributor and wife of Eric Trump, has bizarrely claimed that the rising cost of the Thanksgiving turkey is part of a liberal plot to chip away at American traditions.

articles.title: Thanksgiving is a day of mourning for New England's Native American tribes - NPR
articles.description: Thursday's National Day of Mourning in Plymouth, Massachusetts, will honor Indigenous people who've suffered centuries of racism and mistreatment. It's the 52nd year the event has been observed.
articles.content: Supporters of Native Americans pause following a prayer during the 38th National Day of Mourning at Coles Hill in Plymouth, Mass., on Nov. 22, 2007. Denouncing centuries of racism and mistreatment of… [+3255 chars]
